subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Dwight Lowery, the Jets’ new cornerback, may be one of the team’s successful fourth-round draft picks, along with Jerricho Cotcher, Kerry Rhodes and Leon Washington.
snippet: Dwight Lowery, the Jets’ new cornerback, may be one of the team’s successful fourth-round draft picks, along with Jerricho Cotcher, Kerry Rhodes and Leon Washington.
